name: Going Home (Matthew King CSG)
description:
A very small game (2 levels) testing an inventory system and navmeshagent. Also tests how a navmeshagent may interact with doors and other items in the environment.

The story is about a warrior who has come back from partying and is trying to go to bed.

Controls: 

LMB - Move

I(i) - Inventory

Esc - Quit
